alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 1:33AM MST until December 04 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Watch, west wind gusts up to 60 mph possible Saturday night. For the second High Wind Watch, west wind gusts up to 60 mph possible Sunday night into Monday morning. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Watch, Saturday night. For the second High Wind Watch, from Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power fluctuations are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, and along Highway 191 from Big Timber to Harlowton. Mild and dry conditions could cause quick fire spread. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
